R

Reader - Class in pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1
The Reader class models a thread that simulates a reader's behavior in a library.

Constructs a Reader with default active and idle times.

requestWriting(Writer) - Method in class Library
Requests writing access for a Writer thread.

run() - Method in class Writer

S

startReading(Reader) - Method in class Library
Starts reading by a Reader thread.
startWriting(Writer) - Method in class Library
Starts writing by a Writer thread.
stopReading(Reader) - Method in class Library
Stops reading by a Reader thread.
stopWriting(Writer) - Method in class Library
Stops writing by a Writer thread and releases the library access permit for all readers.
